head.supplied: Memorandum. Dr Von Mueller & Technological Committee...

div.p: From Marcus Clarke to the Committee of the Industrial Museum, Melbourne
VPRS 5834/P0/1, inward correspondence p. 61, VA 1411 Industrial and Technological Museum, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Memorandum. Dr Von Mueller & Technological Committee
Memorandum filed next to M to R. Barry, 4 November 1870, and probably drawn up to inform the committee's discussion of matters raised in that letter.

cell.p: The Committee declined to grant application for Â£50 by letter No 19/I.T.M.
